name: Head Request / Get File Info
plugin_instructions:
Ther's two way to get file info: Using an Action or using element on a page

Element: Drop "FileInfo" element and complete the "File url" field. Plugin will return info in states of the element.

Action: Use "Get File Info" action. This will return the values of the file that can be used in next action.

*** A CORS issue can happen using element. This will not happen with action because the call is server side.
